name: World of Warships: Legends – The Old Friend
name_original: World of Warships: Legends – The Old Friend
description:
"Old reliable" is coming back: claim Charleston along with various in-game content in this free bundle.

The package includes: Tier II USN Premium cruiser Charleston 5 days of Premium Account 5x Promotion Orders 10x Type 4 Camos 10x Anniversary Camos 15x Rare Ship XP Boosters 15x Rare Credit Boosters 15x Rare Commander XP Boosters 15x Rare Global XP Boosters 15x Rare Battle Boosters 37,000 Commander XP

Note: some content, including Boosters, Commander XP, Camouflages, etc., only becomes visible upon reaching a specific account level in the game.
